channel.title: Holes due tomoz :/
channel.description: ok hey guys i have to write a letter to an editor of a popular teenage magazine and explain why this novel holes should be read by other teenagers :s due tommorow so any suggestions? if u have seen movie or read book?

item.title: Holes due tomoz :/
item.dc:creator: @marluxia marluxia
item.description:
@marluxia wrote:

What the hell? I had this same thing! :eek:… erm I’ll give it a shot

“Who thought a book about a fat teenager who digs holes all day, inside a nazi prison camp could be made into a movie! If your still reading up to this point maybe you should see the movie and the book!”

alright seriously i’ll give you the one i made…

Dear Editor,

I’m here to tell you about the book “Holes”. First of all “Holes” is a poor book, the main character is a obese kid (Stanley) who got charged for stealing shoes.

Holes is set in a barren waste land in texas called “Camp Green Lake”, the book has many similarities to “Camp Green Lake”, dry and boring!

The interwoven plot in holes involves a Gypsy who puts a curse on Stanley’s family because Stanley’s Great Great Grandfather didn’t carry the Gypsy up the mountain. Later in the story Stanley coincidently befriends the Great Great Grandson of the Gypsy (Zero), though Stanley does not know this. At the end of the Story Stanley takes Zero up the mountain thus breaking the curse!

Yea that’s what i wrote i got 14/20 and it says…

Quite well explained and well thought out

Cheers, oh and tell me what you get

Read full topic
